title: (x) Another grotesque - New Wave Films - Interface {Cheshire Dave}
content:
Hi all-

Can't help but feel I'm just having a mental block, but after much searching nothing has surfaced for this type, found on all boxart for New Wave Films' DVD releases in the UK: it shares characteristics with Gotham (Hoefler) and Akzidenz Grotesk (Berthold), but it's distinguished by unusual characters such as the cap-Q in this image. Anyone care to shed a little light?

Cheers,  
Nick

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/quietchaos_4418.jpg)
author: NJMcLellan

comments.content:
Dalton Maag's [Interface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019055404/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/interface)

I'd like to say that I figured it out, but I simply asked the company. But success nonetheless!
Nearly a year later, thanks, Dave; I contacted them as well, but was quietly ignored.
